title: Attention West Virginia, Maryland, Minnesota, Kansas, Oregon, New Jersey, Virginia, & Washington D.C. - This is your last day to register to vote!
selftext:
#Attention West Virginia, Maryland, Minnesota, Kansas,  Oregon, New Jersey, Virginia, & Washington D.C.

#This is your last day to register to vote!

---------

**Maryland, Minnesota & Washington D.C. all have same day registration. But do not wait until then.**

--------------------

#REGISTER NOW!

* https://vote.gov/

**It only takes a few minutes.**


-------------------

#Massachusetts & Wisconsin: Your last day is tomorrow! (the 14th)

#Nebraska last day is Friday!
--------------

If I have errored or left out information, please comment below to correct it.


-------------

#EDIT: Virginia's online voter registration system crashed today. Officials blame a fiber optic cable that was cut.

**Governor Northam as well as other officials called for a 1-day extension to the deadline. VA law requires a court order for that to happen.**

* https://www.washingtonpost.com/local/va-politics/virginia-state-websites-shut-down/2020/10/13/8e4443d8-0d5d-11eb-b1e8-16b59b92b36d_story.html
